Growth Pilot is a powerful tool for lead generation on LinkedIn. It allows users to extract extract leads and contact them with ease. With its user-friendly interface and advanced features, Growth Pilot is a valuable resource for businesses looking to expand their reach and gain a competitive edge. Use Growth Pilot seamlessly by installing our Chrome browser extension. This extension will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies each time you use Growth Pilot.

Here is what you can achieve by using Growth Pilot:

- Manage your lead generation campaigns in one place.
- Collect additional lead information and create a link between platforms.
- Collect lead data from LinkedIn and connect with your leads.

How does this extension work?

This extension will automatically retrieve the session cookies of the websites you are connected to. Once you log into your Growth Pilot account, click on â€œConnect to LinkedIn" to fill out the session cookies input field. If you have any questions about this extension, feel free to send us an email to our support team at contact@growthpilot.fr or directly via our live chat.
